CustomField.description: Used to determine expected ship date for kits. Used in Report to identify problems with shipping.
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(Hold_Shipment_Until__c)), Hold_Shipment_Until__c, IF ( WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))= 1, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+1, IF ( WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))= 7, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+2, IF ( AND( WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))= 6, OR( HOUR(TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate )) < 5, HOUR(TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate )) > 18)), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+3, IF ( OR( HOUR(TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate )) < 5, HOUR(TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate )) > 18), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+1, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))))))
CustomField.label: Expected Shipping Date
